item.title: Using the Vagrant virtual machine
item.description: Vagrant repository is no longer updated. To test the PrestaShop pull requests, we recommend using the Docker environment or local installation. Using the Vagrant virtual machine We recommend using our virtual machine to quickly get a testing environment in place. Requirements This is what you need to run this project: Vagrant VirtualBox If you’re using Windows, we recommend you to download Git bash and execute all commands under this shell.
